text: Ellery Queen is an American mystery drama series that aired on NBC. It was based on the fictional character of the same name and ran for one season and 22 episodes from September 11, 1975 to April 4, 1976. It starred Jim Hutton as the title character and David Wayne as the inspector. ==Other websites== * Category:1975 American television series debuts Category:1976 television series endings Category:1976 disestablishments in the United States Category:1970s American television series Category:NBC network series Category:American drama television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Ellery Queen (TV series)
